SELECT t.id, t.skill, t.image, COUNT(at.tag_id) AS tag_count FROM articles a INNER JOIN article_tags at ON a.id = at.article_id INNER JOIN tags t ON t.id = at.tag_id
WHERE a.posted_date > date_sub(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 day)
WHERE a.posted_date > date_sub(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 365 day)
GROUP BY t.id, t.skill, t.image ORDER BY COUNT(at.tag_id) DESC LIMIT 20;
